name: Håtvåessofyra
description:
Little shooter-platformer made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44. Made from scratch in GameMaker Studio 2 with sound and music made in FL Studio. I'm pretty happy with the outcome but I still wish I would have another day to add more items in the shop, enemy types and level layouts. I will go to sleep now byee

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/hatvaessofyra
